data.label: Slot start
data.annotation: The slot will contain two rounds, the beacon round and the execution round

data.label: Beacon Lottery
data.annotation: The beacon proposer for the next block is already chosen for this block

data.label: Block Proposed
data.annotation: The proposer proposes the block with only the inclusion list - therefore home stakers can participate without a handicap.

data.label: Block Attested
data.annotation: The Attester comittee attests the validity of the inclusion list.

data.label: Execution Lottery
data.annotation: The rights to execute the current block with the inclusion list already belong to a proposer.

data.label: Exec Block Proposed
data.annotation: The block is executed with the inclusion list and any other MEV related transactions and proposed.

data.label: Exec Block Attested
data.annotation: The execution block committee attests the validity of the block.

sequence.annotation: The slot will contain two rounds, the beacon round and the execution round
The beacon proposer for the next block is already chosen for this block
The proposer proposes the block with only the inclusion list - therefore home stakers can participate without a handicap.
The Attester comittee attests the validity of the inclusion list.
The rights to execute the current block with the inclusion list already belong to a proposer.
The block is executed with the inclusion list and any other MEV related transactions and proposed.
The execution block committee attests the validity of the block.
